However, it is important to note that while Flaubert created one of the most iconic characters in literary history - Désirée Maxime - he did not directly write under the pseudonym "Lolita." The character Lolita from another novel titled "Lolita" was written by Vladimir Nabokov, an American-born Russian author who emigrated to the United States.
